article:
A friend's daughter, Lucy, is twelve. She is in the countryside  with _ grandparents. My friend and his wife _ in Beijing. Lucy doesn't have _ sisters or brothers.
Every morning, Lucy's _ , Mr Lin, takes breakfast to her room. He _ Lucy likes Beijing food very much. Lucy loves her grandfather and wants to do something to _ him.
One morning, Mr Lin takes breakfast to Lucy's room. _ he can't find his granddaughter. "Lucy, _ are you?" "I'm here, in the kitchen ," Lucy says and takes a hamburger  with some vegetable _ her grandpa. "Dear Grandpa, thanks for your breakfast. And this hamburger is made for you. It's good for your health. ." What a _ girl!
